div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Set against a beautiful mountainside, our Thousand Oaks Plaza apartments offer the best in comfort and convenience. Find thoughtfully designed spacious one-, and two-bedroom apartment homes. Relax in front of your fireplace after a long day's work, take a refreshing dip in our sparkling swimming pool, or get your daily workout in at our state-of-the art fitness center. Our apartments feature abundant closet space, high ceilings, spacious floor plans, and a complete full-size appliance package. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Great Thousand Oaks apartments, great service and the amenities you deserve. All at a location that's exactly right, exactly where you want to be. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. THOUSAND OAKS APARTMENTS BY AVALON Avalon Thousand Oaks Plaza brings the best of Ventura County to your doorstep. Located close to the 101 Highway and Route 23, and just a short distance from The Lakes at the Promenade and The Oaks Mall, our fabulous location in the heart of a residential neighborhood features nearby schools, parks, golfing, shopping and more. This beautiful community is surrounded by the cities of Simi Valley, Agoura Hills, and Camarillo among others. Major transportation options like freeways, train and bus stations are nearby. Some of the local businesses that are within walking distance to the community include Elks Lodge, Hana Café, Portofino Italian Bistro, SunLife Organics, Beyer Park, and First Citizen Bank. THOUSAND OAKS APARTMENT COMMUNITY As a resident of our Avalon Thousand Oaks Plaza community, you will have access to our exclusive Avalon Advantage program. As a member, you will get to enjoy special benefits like a national relocation program, a maintenance response guarantee, a 30-day move-in guarantee, and other perks and privileges. Don’t hesitate a moment longer. Contact us to schedule an appointment and learn more about your new apartment in Thousand Oaks today.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.h2: Living at Avalon Thousand Oaks Plaza
div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Cats and dogs are welcome. Please check the dog breed and pet restrictions.

div.p: We are here for you. Let us know how we can help you find your perfect home.

We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Set against a beautiful mountainside, our Thousand Oaks Plaza apartments offer the best in comfort and convenience. Find thoughtfully designed spacious one-, and two-bedroom apartment homes. Relax in front of your fireplace after a long day's work, take a refreshing dip in our sparkling swimming pool, or get your daily workout in at our state-of-the art fitness center. Our apartments feature abundant closet space, high ceilings, spacious floor plans, and a complete full-size appliance package. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Great Thousand Oaks apartments, great service and the amenities you deserve. All at a location that's exactly right, exactly where you want to be. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. THOUSAND OAKS APARTMENTS BY AVALON Avalon Thousand Oaks Plaza brings the best of Ventura County to your doorstep. Located close to the 101 Highway and Route 23, and just a short distance from The Lakes at the Promenade and The Oaks Mall, our fabulous location in the heart of a residential neighborhood features nearby schools, parks, golfing, shopping and more. This beautiful community is surrounded by the cities of Simi Valley, Agoura Hills, and Camarillo among others. Major transportation options like freeways, train and bus stations are nearby. Some of the local businesses that are within walking distance to the community include Elks Lodge, Hana Café, Portofino Italian Bistro, SunLife Organics, Beyer Park, and First Citizen Bank. THOUSAND OAKS APARTMENT COMMUNITY As a resident of our Avalon Thousand Oaks Plaza community, you will have access to our exclusive Avalon Advantage program. As a member, you will get to enjoy special benefits like a national relocation program, a maintenance response guarantee, a 30-day move-in guarantee, and other perks and privileges. Don’t hesitate a moment longer.
